pydexpi.loaders.graph_loader module

class pydexpi.loaders.graph_loader.GraphLoader(plant_graph: DiGraph | None = None, plant_model: DexpiModel | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Loads a DEXPI model instance into networkX graph

plant_graph(nx.DiGraph)
Type:

Graph version of a plant.

plant_model(DexpiModel)
Type:

Instance of DexpiModel.

parse_dexpi_to_graph: Parses DexpiModel class to graph
parse_graph_to_dexpi: Parses graph to DEXPIModel class (not implemented

yet).

determine_reference(dexpi_object)[source]

Determine the references (Proteus: “association”) of an object. - SignalConveyingFunction: source and target

Parameters:

dexpi_object (object) – DEXPI object that describes reference.

Returns:

List of DEXPI object to be used as reference.

Return type:

list

Parse a given DexpiModel to a networkX graph.

Create networkX graph from equipment and piping

parse_graph_to_dexpi()[source]

Parse a networkX graph of DEXPI classes to a DexpiModel. Not implemented yet.

Extend graph of equipment and piping with instrumentation.
